nodes.text: The Vigilance was a light cruiser that served with the Cularin Militia during the Clone Wars. It was commanded by Captain Suubrin and in circa 19 BBY was sent on a mission to investigate an Abandoned Separatist base. It arrived in the system where the base was and attacked some Droid starfighters and some Z-95 Headhunters that were there. Troops were landed from it to the base, while Suubrin then flew it to investigate a mystery starfighter that had just arrived. This turned out to be flown by the Cerean Jedi Master Ki-Adi-Mundi and he landed on the Vigilance.
